name: Escape from limbo
overview: An overhead maze action game created by Greippi for the Finity Games group in 2022 and released at the Posadas Party 2022 Autumn, ranked 1 in the Game Competition. In the game you are stuck in Limbo. The only way out is to clear most of the freaks on the way. Collect and use blasts to explode walls. 12 levels of AI generated wisdom await!
